verses.text: \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w Are|strong="G1487"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w hearken|strong="G0191"\w*; The \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* \w unto|strong="G3962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, when he \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Mesopotamia|strong="G3318"\w*, \w before|strong="G4250"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Charran|strong="G5488"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Get thee \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w country|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w kindred|strong="G4772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1204"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I shall \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* came he \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of the \w Chaldæans|strong="G5466"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Charran|strong="G5488"\w*: and from \w thence|strong="G2547"\w*, \w when|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* was \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*, he \w removed|strong="G3351"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, no, \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \add so much as\add* to set his foot \w on|strong="G0968"\w*: \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* he \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* that he would give \w it|strong="G1325"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* for a \w possession|strong="G2697"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4690"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w when|strong="G5607"\w* \add as yet\add* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G5607"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* on this \w wise|strong="G3779"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w should|strong="G2071"\w* \w sojourn|strong="G3941"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w strange|strong="G0245"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that they should \w bring|strong="G1402"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* into \w bondage|strong="G1402"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entreat|strong="G2559"\w* \add them\add* \w evil|strong="G2559"\w* four \w hundred|strong="G5071"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they shall be in \w bondage|strong="G1398"\w* \w will|strong="G2919"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* shall they come \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* of \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add Abraham\add* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w eighth|strong="G3590"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \add begat\add* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \add begat\add* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w patriarchs|strong="G3966"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w patriarchs|strong="G3966"\w*, moved with \w envy|strong="G2206"\w*, \w sold|strong="G0591"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G1807"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w afflictions|strong="G2347"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w favour|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1726"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="G5328"\w* \w king|strong="G0935"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w made|strong="G2525"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w governor|strong="G2233"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* a \w dearth|strong="G3042"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Chanaan|strong="G5477"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w sustenance|strong="G5527"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G0191"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* that there \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w corn|strong="G4621"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, he sent \w out|strong="G1821"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \add time\add* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* was made \w known|strong="G0319"\w* \w to|strong="G0080"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joseph’s|strong="G2501"\w* \w kindred|strong="G1085"\w* was \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w known|strong="G5318"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="G5328"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w called|strong="G3333"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \add him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w kindred|strong="G4772"\w*, \w threescore|strong="G1440"\w* and \w fifteen|strong="G4002"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w died|strong="G5053"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* were carried \w over|strong="G3346"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Sychem|strong="G4966"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3418"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w bought|strong="G5608"\w* for a \w sum|strong="G5092"\w* of \w money|strong="G0694"\w* of the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w Emmor|strong="G1697"\w* \add the father\add* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w Sychem|strong="G4966"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G2531"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* of the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* drew \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w sworn|strong="G3660"\w* to \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w grew|strong="G0837"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*,

\w Till|strong="G0891"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*.

The \w same|strong="G3778"\w* dealt \w subtilly|strong="G2686"\w* \w with|strong="G1085"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w kindred|strong="G1085"\w*, and evil \w entreated|strong="G2559"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, so that \w they|strong="G4160"\w* cast \w out|strong="G1570"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* young \w children|strong="G1025"\w*, to the \w end|strong="G1519"\w* they \w might|strong="G2225"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w live|strong="G2225"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* was \w born|strong="G1080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G2316"\w* \w fair|strong="G0791"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nourished|strong="G0397"\w* up \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father’s|strong="G3962"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1620"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was cast \w out|strong="G1620"\w*, \w Pharaoh’s|strong="G5328"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w* \w took|strong="G0397"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* up, and \w nourished|strong="G0397"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* her \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* was \w learned|strong="G3811"\w* in \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="G0124"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w full|strong="G4137"\w* forty \w years|strong="G5063"\w* \w old|strong="G5550"\w*, it \w came|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* to \w visit|strong="G1980"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeing|strong="G1492"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \add of them\add* suffer \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w*, he \w defended|strong="G0292"\w* \add him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w avenged|strong="G1557"\w* him that was \w oppressed|strong="G2669"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w smote|strong="G3960"\w* the \w Egyptian|strong="G0124"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1161"\w* he \w supposed|strong="G3543"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* would have \w understood|strong="G4920"\w* how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* would \w deliver|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* they \w understood|strong="G4920"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* the \w next|strong="G1966"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* he shewed \w himself|strong="G3700"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* as they \w strove|strong="G3164"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* would have \w set|strong="G4900"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w one|strong="G1515"\w* \w again|strong="G4900"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Sirs|strong="G0435"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*; \w why|strong="G2444"\w* do ye \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w* one to \w another|strong="G0240"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he that \w did|strong="G0091"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w* \w thrust|strong="G0683"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0683"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w made|strong="G2525"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* a \w ruler|strong="G0758"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w judge|strong="G1348"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*?

\w Wilt|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w as|strong="G5158"\w* \w thou|strong="G0337"\w* \w diddest|strong="G2309"\w* the \w Egyptian|strong="G0124"\w* \w yesterday|strong="G5504"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w fled|strong="G5343"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w stranger|strong="G3941"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Madian|strong="G3099"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* he \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G4137"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* were \w expired|strong="G4137"\w*, there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* of \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w Sina|strong="G4614"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w flame|strong="G5395"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* in a \w bush|strong="G0942"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, he \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w* at the \w sight|strong="G3705"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* as he drew \w near|strong="G4334"\w* to \w behold|strong="G2657"\w* \add it\add*, the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\add Saying\add*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add am\add* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*. \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w trembled|strong="G1790"\w*, and \w durst|strong="G5111"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w behold|strong="G2657"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Put \w off|strong="G3089"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w shoes|strong="G5266"\w* \w from|strong="G4228"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w standest|strong="G2476"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w ground|strong="G1093"\w*.

I have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*, I have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* the \w affliction|strong="G2561"\w* \w of|strong="G2992"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w groaning|strong="G4726"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* am come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* to \w deliver|strong="G1807"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w come|strong="G1204"\w*, I will \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5126"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w refused|strong="G0720"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w made|strong="G2525"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* a \w ruler|strong="G0758"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w judge|strong="G1348"\w*? the \w same|strong="G5126"\w* \w did|strong="G0649"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \add to be\add* a \w ruler|strong="G0758"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w deliverer|strong="G3086"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w bush|strong="G0942"\w*.

\w He|strong="G3778"\w* \w brought|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1806"\w*, after that he had \w shewed|strong="G4160"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2281"\w* Red \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

¶ \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, which \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, A \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w shall|strong="G0450"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* raise \w up|strong="G0450"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w like|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1691"\w*; \w him|strong="G0846"\w* shall ye \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*.
